name: Youth Housing and Shelter Resources - Bayview
description: 3rd Street Youth Center is a Coordinated Entry Access Point for youth (aged 18 to 27 years) who are experiencing homelessness or are at risk of homelessness. Services available include: - Problem-Solving support - Housing assessments - Housing case management - Referral to community services This is a connection to available shelter. How to Apply: - Coordinated Access Point address is: 5688 3rd Street San Francisco, CA 94124 - Schedule an appointment by calling 415-839-1706. If no one is able to

howToGetIt: How to Apply: - Schedule an appointment by calling 415-839-1706. If no one is able to take your call, leave a voicemail with: - your name - your contact information - your preferred language Service Contact Information: - Phone: 415-839-1706
